title: What are the features of Windows Server Essentials? - Quora

response.answer_text: Before knowing the features let us understand what is Windows Server Essentials? Windows Server Essentials is an integrated server suite from Microsoft, it is created for the purpose of running network infrastructure. Windows Server Essential runs both intranet management and Internet access of small and medium-sized businesses. This product mainly aims at small businesses which has zero IT support and indicates the dedication of the organization to serve the market. Application server technologies are being integrated to offer management benefits like enhanced monitoring, Remote Web Workplace, integrated setup, a unified management console, remote access and much more.
